title: Huge Fairmount 2 Bedroom with Roof Deck
description:
Located in one of Philadelphia's best neighborhoods, this bi-level apartment plus huge PRIVATE roof deck has it all! It offers an abundance of space with an open floor-plan. The kitchen features high end finishes with solid wood cabinets, quartz cabinets and stainless steel appliances.

The apartment is perfectly located and easily accessible to all major highways, public transportation and a few minute ride from Center City and Fairmount Ave! Schedule your showing today before this gem is gone!

title: Just Like Heaven
description:
Welcome to the Hilltop community! This ground level one bedroom condo in the Summit section of Hilltop is conveniently located in Brookhaven Boro. Bright and spacious, this unit offers a shared living room and dining area with large sliding glass doors leading from the living room to a ground floor patio with plenty of privacy. The beautifully updated kitchen offers granite countertops, tiled backsplash, stainless steel appliances, vinyl plank floors, and plenty of beautiful wood cabinets for storage. The updated bath features a tiled tub/shower,and granite vanity. The nicely sized bedroom features a large walk-in closet with plenty of space. Washer and dryer are included in the unit in a hallway closet area providing more storage space! Community amenities include swimming pool, tennis courts, playground, and clubhouse. Convenient to downtown Media and West Chester with many fabulous restaurants and bars, shops, and local theater. Easy access to major roads and public transportation to center city Philadelphia. title: Move right into this absolutely gorgeous, 2 bed, 2.5 bath newly renova
description:
Inspired from the town of Tulum, Vesset Capital Partners brings you a tranquil and trendy renovation. Move right into this absolutely gorgeous, 2 bed, 2.5 bath newly renovated GRADUATE HOSPITAL townhome! This home is light-filled and contemporary with an eye-catching facade, custom wooden slat staircase, hardwood flooring, exposed brick accent walls, and a spacious back patio with in-ground garden beds. A bright open floor plan greets you as you enter the home, and the slatted wood staircase really defines the living room and gives a boho vibe. Heading past the living room you'll find a dining space, half bath with barn door and stylist wall paper and an eat-in kitchen. The kitchen features a breakfast bar, two toned flat panel cabinets, black cabinet pulls and faucet, quartz countertops, marble backsplash, and upgraded stainless steel appliances including a 6-range burner and a smart fridge. The dining room and kitchen feel fresh and airy with south-facing windows and access to the back patio with garden beds and modern privacy fencing. Head to the second floor for 2 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms. The two nicely sized bedrooms feature great closet space and natural and recessed lighting. The primary bedroom is complete with built-in storage next to the ensuite bath and a unique cutout by the window, perfect for plants. Both full bathrooms feature custom floor and shower tiling, a rain shower head in the primary bathroom, vanity storage, and a waterfall sink faucet. The second bedroom features exposed brick and ample windows. Need extra room? The fully finished basement is ideal for an additional living area, playroom, gym, or home office with storage along with a washer/dryer. This GRADUATE HOSPITAL location is amazing. You have groceries, fitness, parks, hot spot cafes, and restaurants all within walking distance. Sprouts Farmers Market, Dock Street Brewing, L’Anima BYO, Target, Marian Anderson Recreation Center, Schuylkill River Boardwalk, Fitzwater Street Philly Bagels, Founding Fathers Sports Bar & Grill, and more are within a mile of home. Plus, access to major highways, public transportation, and Center City is easy. Want to see this in person? Schedule your showing today!
1516 Montrose St

title: Spacious and One of the Best Apartment Buildings in Philadelphia!!
description:
The Metropolitan apartments in Center City, Philadelphia stand tall in the center of Philadelphia's historic skyline. Designed by French architect Louis Jallade in the 1920s, this twin-tower apartment building showcases 26 stories of Art Deco elegance and has a prominent history as the former Philadelphia YMCA Armed Forces Building. Before being transformed into the Center City apartment building it is today, The Metropolitan was home to United States servicemen during World War II. Today, The Metropolitan is recognized as one of the best apartment buildings in Philadelphia. You will find a spacious studio, 1-, 2-and 3-bedroom apartment rentals. As well as amenities that include a lounge, gym, basketball court and a rooftop with a gorgeous view of the City Hall and Love Park. The Metropolitan apartments feature original limestone details, terra-cotta tiles, and hand-carved cornices. Fall in love with restored architectural details and contemporary amenities, including renovated kitchens with luxurious personal touches.

title: ***Photos are of a similar unit, every unit is unique.***
description:
***Photos are of a similar unit, every unit is unique.*** Welcome to 1217 Spring Garden! This five-story building, the first reinforced concrete structure in the city, began life towards the end of the 19th century as the home of the Bilgram Machine Works and was later converted into this uniquely designed loft-style building featuring 40 units in its entirety. Each unit with its own DNA and original structure! As you enter the building using it’s smart building access controls, you’ll find a lobby designed to both pay homage to the building’s 19th-century industrial past and add some 21st-century gloss. You’ll also take notice of its wheel chair accessibility and new elevator in the former freight elevator shaft. Mail room is also located in the main lobby for convenience. Take a ride up to the 3rd floor where you’ll find unit 304. Walk right into the original industrial DNA design including its original hard wood flooring, loft, and brick exposed walls. You’ll surely take notice of it’s high ceiling and solid structure! As you move along you’ll find a large kitchen with plenty of cabinet storage and all of your essential appliances and your two nicely sized bedrooms. Your master bedroom includes a large closet and master bath! Make sure you stop by the fitness center and bicycle + skateboard storage room located on level B. Enjoy the tour!

description:
Spacious bi-level 1 bedroom, 1.5 bath, 1,166 sqft, third floor condo unit located in a restored brownstone in a prime Art Museum/Francisville location! Erin

description: Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. title: Wonderful Ranch House for Rent
description:
Pictures coming soon.
Rent this wonderful 1800 sq ft. ranch style home with a flagstone patio courtyard, detached 2 car garage, and circular driveway on a beautiful 1.5-acre lot.  It is located across the street from a walking trail and down the road from Natural Lands’ Gwynedd Preserve. It’s convenient to shopping and restaurants.  The house is 1.5 miles to either Gwynedd Valley or North Wales commuter train stations on the SEPTA Lansdale/Doylestown line.
The house has been extensively renovated in the last 5 years- new roof, gutters, insulation, paint (interior/exterior), floors, HVAC (ac/furnace), hot water heater, electric (including hardwired smoke and carbon monoxide detectors), and plumbing.  The house has dark-stained hardwood floors (tile in bathrooms) and great light from numerous large windows throughout.  The windows have top-down bottom-up cordless honeycomb shades.
The lovely eat-in kitchen (19’ x 15’) is equipped with stainless steel KitchenAid Appliances (5-burner slide-in gas range with conventional, convection, or steam bake options; 22 cu ft counter-depth French door refrigerator w/ filtered interior water dispenser and ice maker; and dishwasher), XO chimney style hood, a Miele paneled undercounter 4.8 cu ft refrigerator, a 1250 watt Panasonic microwave, a 33” stainless steel single bowl apron (farmhouse) sink, garbage disposal, additional bar sink, Brizo pull down faucets, quartz countertops, and marble backsplash. The painted full overlay cabinets offer plenty of storage with full extension drawers and roll-out shelves, soft-close drawers/doors, and hands-free trash/recycling.
The living room (18’ x 15’) has a fireplace with marble hearth and surround and contemporary black mantel with Sanus TV wall mount. Additionally, it has built-in tall cabinet storage.
The primary bedroom (16’ x 11.5’) has two 5.5’ wide double hung reach-in closets.  The ensuite bath includes a 5’ floating vanity with quartz countertop, Moen single lever handle faucet, Robern medicine cabinet (interior electrical outlet), Kohler wall sconces, floating linen cabinet, and Kohler wall hung toilet.  The zero-threshold shower has a Kohler multi-spray wall-mount showerhead, (a slidebar with) an adjustable height multi-spray handheld shower, and a frameless glass enclosure.
The back section of the rancher consists of 3 bedrooms (10.5’ x 10’, 12’ x 10’, 10’ x 9.5’), a laundry room (10.5' x 10.5') with LG front loading washer (5.2 cu ft “mega capacity”) and (gas) dryer (9.0 cu ft “mega capacity”) with pedestal bases and an additional closet, and a second bathroom with bathtub.
The garage dimensions are 21.5’ W x 24’ D with a single 16’ W x 7’ H garage door and the obligatory full-size side by side refrigerator/freezer (Kenmore 2007).
The house is available April 1, 2023. Landlord is responsible for cutting the grass and fall and spring yard cleanup.  Tenant is responsible for all utilities and snow/ice removal.  Absolutely NO smoking (cigarette/cigar/pipe/marijuana/etc.) of any kind or illicit drug use on property.  Established pets are allowed with landlord approval and require a separate pet deposit of $1000. Rent is $3,500/month and lease terms are 1 year.  Any interested applicants should self-assess if the rent is 30% or less of their household’s gross income and if their credit scores are 700 or above.  Applicants who meet these terms, or who have a co-signer who can, and would like to apply to rent the house will submit for credit check, employment and income verification, background check, eviction record history, and landlord reference check.  Any individual 18 or older who would be living in the house are required to submit to the same checks and sign the lease, and all occupants (persons under 18) must be listed at the time of application (and lease signing). At lease signing, the tenant will pay the first month’s rent and a $3500 security deposit, and a pet security deposit if applicable; the tenant will also be required to have a 500k renter's insurance policy in place.  The property manager lives across the street.  If you have questions, contact Heather/Eric at  show contact info
to learn more.
